meanings.definition: Supercrosses (verb): to participate in or compete in supercross events.
meanings.sent1: He supercrosses with skill and determination.
meanings.sent2: She supercrosses every weekend at the local track.
meanings.sent3: The cat supercrosses over the hurdles in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His imagination supercrosses through the realms of fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The dancer supercrosses gracefully across the stage.

meanings.definition: Supercrosses (noun): motorcycle races held on artificially constructed dirt tracks featuring steep jumps and obstacles.
meanings.sent1: The supercrosses were thrilling to watch.
meanings.sent2: Fans gathered to watch the supercrosses at the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The supercrosses on TV made the cat curious.
meanings.sent4: The supercrosses of life can be challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the supercrosses lingered in his mind.
